Description: Gorgeous, pet friendy, all freshly painted, cathedral ceilings in the large open living room, Lots of windows off of the large open dining room. Second floor, deleted front and back porch, brand new gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. 2 good sized bedrooms, one smaller room for office. Hardwood floors throughout, gas heat, Central air, yard. 2 car tandem parking driveway shared with downstairs tenants. Close to Dunkin' Donuts and Main Street. Good credit is a must, one month rent as the broker fee if applying.
